name: Fushimi Inari Shrine Hike
description: Walk through thousands of vermillion torii gates up Mount Inari. This iconic shrine offers stunning photo opportunities and peaceful forest trails. Takes 2-3 hours for full hike.

name: Santorini Sunset Cruise
description: Sail around the caldera at sunset with swimming stops at hot springs and Red Beach. Includes dinner and drinks. Unforgettable views of the island from the water.

name: Golden Circle Tour
description: Visit Iceland's most famous natural wonders: Thingvellir National Park, Geysir geothermal area, and Gullfoss waterfall. Full day tour with guide.

name: Traditional Hammam Experience
description: Authentic Moroccan spa experience with steam bath, exfoliation, and massage. Relaxing and culturally immersive. Perfect after exploring the medina.

name: Lake Louise Canoe Rental
description: Paddle on the stunning turquoise waters of Lake Louise surrounded by mountains and glaciers. Iconic Canadian Rockies experience with incredible photo opportunities.

name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove Walk
description: Stroll through towering bamboo stalks in this magical forest. Visit nearby temples and the famous Togetsukyo Bridge. Free to enter, best visited early morning.

name: Wine Tasting Tour
description: Visit traditional Santorini wineries and taste unique volcanic wines. Learn about ancient winemaking techniques while enjoying caldera views.

name: Blue Lagoon Spa
description: Relax in Iceland's famous geothermal spa with milky blue waters rich in minerals. Includes silica mud mask and stunning lava field views. Book in advance.

name: Jemaa el-Fnaa Evening Experience
description: Explore the bustling main square with food stalls, snake charmers, musicians, and storytellers. Authentic Moroccan atmosphere and street food paradise.

name: Banff Gondola Ride
description: Ride to the summit of Sulphur Mountain for panoramic views of six mountain ranges. Includes boardwalk, interpretive center, and restaurant at the top.
